com.aeros.models

Class Measurement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeros.models.Measurement

  • public class Measurement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for storing and validating measurements
    Since:
    1.0 Beta 1
    Author:
    Aeros Development
